Docs.summary: The Microsoft.VisualBasic.ApplicationServices namespace contains types that support the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application Model and provide access to application information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about the [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)] Application Model, see [Overview of the Visual Basic Application Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
